participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and supportive, with a passion for gaming and creativity.
participant_1.background: I have been on the design team for over 65 video games. My son plays on the local football team. I am trying to create my own startup company in the gaming industry. My wife recently got laid off from her human resources job.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, with a love for animals and art.
participant_2.background: People say I talk when Iâ€™m not supposed to. I could eat less. My dream is to be a veterinarian. My three ring binder has my drawings of ponies all over it. I hate that my mom made me get braces.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking. I'm a little tired, but I'm excited to meet you.
Nice to meet you too! I'm participant_1. What do you do for a living?
I'm a veterinarian in training. I'm really passionate about animals, and I can't wait to get my license and start working with them.
That's amazing! I've always loved animals too. What kind of animals do you like to work with?
I love all animals, but I'm especially interested in working with horses. I think they're beautiful and majestic creatures.
I agree! Horses are amazing animals. I've always wanted to learn how to ride one.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to look into it. What's your favorite thing about being a veterinarian in training?
I love being able to help animals and make a difference in their lives. It's so rewarding to see them get better and know that you played a role in that.
That's such a great feeling. I'm sure you're going to be a great veterinarian.
Thanks! I'm really excited to get started.
Well, I'm sure you're going to do great things.
